item.title: Ashlan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Help means ruin and saving means slaying." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "What Is Love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "He that can have patience can have what he will." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I like your Christ, I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "Toto, I have a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore." -- L. Frank Baum

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Political language is designed to make lies sound truthful and murder respectable, and to give an appearance of solidity to pure wind. " -- George Orwell

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "The rights of every man are diminished when the rights of one man are threatened." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Harry S. Truman
item.description:
"Once a government is committed to the principle of silencing the voice of opposition, it has only one way to go, and that is down the path of increasingly repressive measures, until it becomes a source of terror to all its citizens and creates a country where everyone lives in fear."
[<i>Special Message to the Congress on the Internal Security of the United States</i>, August 8, 1950]" -- Harry S. Truman

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Pericles
item.description: "Just because you do not take an interest in politics doesn't mean politics won't take an interest in you. " -- Pericles

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "A politician needs the ability to foretell what is going to happen tomorrow, next week, next month, and next year. And to have the ability afterwards to explain why it didn't happen." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Sidney Sheldon
item.description: "the difference between a rebel and a patriot depends upon who is in power at the moment." -- Sidney Sheldon

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon
item.description: "Half of writing history is hiding the truth." -- Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon

item.title: Ashlan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "The farther backward you can look, the farther forward you are likely to see." -- Winston S. Churchill
